referenceList: In the WHO list of Essential Medicines 2021
therapeuticAction: Antiviral medicine active against herpes virus
instructionsForUse: For the prevention and treatment of neonatal herpes keratitis, ganciclovir may temporarily replace aciclovir in case of supply constraints
isRelatedTo:
DEXOGANC1G-
STD GANCICLOVIR, 0.15%, eye gel, sterile
